stories.text:
Recently heard the news about Meta/FB ordering a hiring freeze. I guess they are preparing for slowdown in next few years or might have just hit their hiring quota. Hearing a lot of startups have started layoffs as well.
Are there similar talks going on in your company as well?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is your company ordering a hiring freeze?
Meta announces plans to slow hiring following challenging quarter

stories.text:
I hate small talks, I build a social game to help me deepen my relationships and connect with people beyond the shallow levels.

I want your feedback, maybe inspire me with questions you would like to see popping in the game.
stories.title: Show HN: Ask Deeply, a social game for small talk haters
Is Mark Twain’s old age best forgotten?
